content.title: Welcome To JP's Ark!
content.text:
JP's Ark is a cluster, self hosted in the UK. 

All the hardware is owned and this ensures the longevity of the servers.

Maps in the cluster:

Scorched Earth
Extinction
The Center
Ragnarok

Mods:

Medieval Guilds & Goblins
ArkNav
Solo Farm
Custom Dino Levels

content.title: Rates + Rules
content.text:
Rules:

Dont ruin anyone elses enjoyment of the game, apart from that enjoy!

Rates:

2x XP
3x Harvest
10x Breeding

Server maintainance will be carried out periodically, this will be announced in Discord beforehand
